---
layout: post
title: "India Cracks Down on Deepfakes: New IT Rules Mandate 'Origin Labels' for AI Content"
description: "The Ministry of Electronics and IT (MeitY) has notified the "IT Amendment Rules 2026" effective immediately.

All AI-generated visual and audio content must now carry a visible label covering at least 10% of the display area.

Platforms failing to remove flagged deepfakes within 36 hours will lose "safe harbor" immunity"

tags: [AI, Cybersecurity]
